RE: 25 Abbots Road - 10 Colt View
mortgage_expiry_threats.context:
Hi Paul,

I did not forward the below but I have chased them and expressed the concern (again) regarding the mortgage offer expiry.

I will keep chasing and will let you know as soon as they do come back to us.
I take it you still haven't had anything from Crest?

I would be grateful if you could impress upon them that if our mortgage offer expires, they will have to do the work on 25 Abbots Road, and they lose their non disclosure agreement.  It's therefore in their best interests to start communicating with you.

second_mortgage_offer.subject: Re: FW: Plot 34 Albany Wood & buy back 25 Abbots Road
second_mortgage_offer.context:
Hi Hannah,

The £999 mortgage broker fee is missing for The Mortgage Workshop.  You
asked for this last week so they must have already had it.

asked for this last week so they must have already had it.

Regarding the redemption fee (£7k), and mortgage arrangement fee (£1495),
do those amounts need to go to the respective companies still?  I think the
£1495 was wrapped into the mortgage so it's effectively already been paid

jade_emails.subject: Fw: Construction Assessment Report - 10 Croft View, Bishops Waltham
jade_emails.excerpt:
Good morning Hannah/Serhan,

Please see the email attached from Trinity Rose regarding their payment.

I would be grateful if you could contact Crest to get this fee paid today so that the report can also be released today.  Once Crest removes the watermark from the contract you the supplemental 3 day possession contract (which surely should have already been ready for their end of October completion), and tells you what the NHBC message needs to be, we can hopefully be prepared for exchange

jade_emails.subject: Re: Construction Assessment Report - 10 Croft View, Bishops Waltham
jade_emails.excerpt:
Good afternoon Ollie,

For our solicitor, please could I just have a one line email confirming that you have not been paid.

This is urgent, so I would be grateful if you could send this today.  Our solicitor will be emailing Crest's solicitors this evening with this information.

Kind regards,
Jade
________________________________
From: Oliver Culhane <o.culhane@trinity-rose.co.uk>
Sent: 28 November 2023 17:51
To: Paul Taylor <paulroberttaylor@gmail.com>; Richard Kirby <r.kirby@trini
